mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RC_MEMBER (MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email})
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_LEVEL FROM RC_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND MEM_PW = #{mem_pw} AND MEM_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT MEM_ID FROM RC_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = #{mem_name} AND MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email} AND MEM_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RC_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND MEM_EMAIL=#{mem_email} AND MEM_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_MEMBER SET MEM_PW = #{mem_pw} WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND MEM_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT GM.GR_ID, G.GR_NAME, GM.GR_LEVEL FROM RC_GROUPMEM GM, RC_GROUP G WHERE GM.GR_ID = G.GR_ID AND GM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND GM.GR_LEVEL = 'GM' AND G.GR_DELYN = 'N'

SELECT PM.PR_ID, P.PR_NAME, PM.PR_LEVEL, GP.GR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM, RC_PROJECT P, RC_GRPRO GP WHERE PM.PR_ID = P.PR_ID AND PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND P.PR_ID = GP.PR_ID AND PM.PR_LEVEL = 'PM' AND P.PR_CONDITION <> 'C' AND P.PR_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE PR_ID = #{pr_id} AND MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_PROJECT P SET P.PR_MEMCNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE P.PR_ID = PM.PR_ID)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RC_GROUPMEM GM WHERE GM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND GM.GR_ID IN (SELECT GR_ID FROM RC_GROUPMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_GROUP G SET G.GR_MEMCNT = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RC_GROUPMEM GM WHERE GM.GR_ID = G.GR_ID)
UPDATE RC_PROJECT P SET PR_SEARCHYN = 'N' WHERE P.PR_ID IN(SELECT PM.PR_ID FROM RC_PROMEM PM WHERE PM.MEM_ID = #{mem_id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RC_PROMEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND PR_LEVEL = 'PM'
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_MEMBER SET MEM_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PHONE FROM RC_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND MEM_DELYN = 'N'
SELECT MEM_PW FROM RC_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND MEM_DELYN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_MEMBER SET MEM_NAME = #{mem_name}, MEM_PW = #{mem_pw}, MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email}, MEM_PHONE = #{mem_phone} WHERE MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
